changeSet.sql: insert into product(id, name, price, category, quantity) values (1, 'Clipper', 2.5, 'TOOL', 1), (2, 'Laptop', 3000, 'ELECTRONICS', 5), (3, 'Phone', 5, 'ELECTRONICS', 6), (4, 'Skirt', 20, 'CLOTHING', 3), (5, 'Pants', 500, 'CLOTHING', 7), (6, 'Apple', 499.99, 'ELECTRONICS', 4), (7, 'Ice Pick', 53, 'TOOL', 12), (8, 'Desk', 25, 'FURNITURE', 3);
